summary: new pathogens include Hantaviruses, Metapneumoviruses, the Coronavirus responsible for severe acute respiratory syndrome and community-acquired strains of methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus. the frequency and importance of emerging new pathogens have significant implications for therapy.
